page.title: 14SHOPPING
page.content: In Marston there is a village shop and post office, however there are no other shopping facilities in either village. 90% of the people living in the area use both the village shop and the larger shops in Grantham and Newark. 5% of the people never use the village shop and about 5% use solely the village shop. These are mostly the housebound and elderly. A lot of people use the village shop whilst collecting their pensions and family allowances. Children help the business because there is a good sweet counter. Many people shop by mail order catalogue.
